features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新图库新增智能抠图和清理建议功能，“收藏空间”升级为“YOYO 记忆”，支持更多应用横幅通知下滑进入悬浮窗，指关节圈选开门新增文字复制功能，推荐您进行更新。
• 新增智能抠图，支持图片主体抠图移位及背景修改 • 新增清理建议功能，支持重复照片、相似图片、超大视频等自动识别，提供更便捷的清理建议
• 通过 YOYO 对话、三指下滑、应用内收藏同步等多种方式帮您快捷记录信息，YOYO 对话可随时快速查找 (文本语义化模型需更新到最新版本，升级路径：设置 > 系统和更新 > 软件更新 > 右上角菜单 > 系统资源)
• 指关节圈选开门新增文字复制功能
• 支持更多应用横幅通知下滑进入悬浮窗
• 滚动截屏过程中支持手动调整截屏范围
• 休眠时间新增 30 分钟和 1 小时选项
• 新增锁屏显示步数开关，支持关闭锁屏界面步数显示
• 在线铃声新增显性标签分类
• 新增键盘抬高功能，抬高区支持“快捷切换键盘”和“语音输入”功能
• 个人热点自动关闭新增“从不”选项，支持个人热点永不关闭
• 已连接的蓝牙音频设备新增展示蓝牙音频编码
• 合入安卓 2025 年 8 月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2025/8
• 焕新桌面设计，全新设计的图标、卡片样式、控制中心，带来耳目一新的美学体验。 • 升级系统视觉风格，更新日历、笔记等应用的色彩和布局设计，使系统更美观、更好用。 • 升级天气时钟卡片，提供色彩丰富、灵动鲜活的个性化选择，带来具有生命力的视觉感知。
• 新增锁屏 AI 扩图功能，智能优化锁屏壁纸构图。体验路径：设置 > 桌面和个性化 > 锁屏样式 > 选择照片 > 双指捏合缩放图片 > 点击右下角弹出的 AI 扩图按钮。 • 新增锁屏 AI 风格功能，使能多样的锁屏壁纸创意风格。体验路径：设置 > 桌面和个性化 > 锁屏样式 > AI 风格。
• 新增扇形变焦功能，提升变焦体验。 • 录像分辨率调整功能移到界面右上角，操作更便捷。 • 调整 AI 摄影等功能开关的入口位置，简化相机顶部工具栏，相机界面更简洁。 • 新增保留相机拍照设置功能，支持保留拍照的自定义设置，包含相机模式、滤镜、动态照片、精彩抓拍。体验路径：相机 > 设置 > 保留设置。
• 新增超级一镜到底动效，在通知控制中心、媒体卡片、来电通知、短信通知等场景，实现跨页面转场的丝滑过渡。
• 新增基于多模态大模型的全新交互，支持图片问答和文档问答；唤醒 YOYO 助理发送图片或文档、拖拽图片或文档到任意门一步开启 YOYO 助理问答。
• 扩展服务场景，新增音乐、阅读、汽车搜索及翻译等服务，意图识别更丰富，体验更便捷。 • 优化任意门图片拖拽功能。支持部分应用界面内可拖拽单张完整的长图，长图不再截断。
• 扩展灵动胶囊使用场景，新增短时天气提醒、AI 换脸检测、荣耀分享等，提升全局触达体验，重要信息不错过。
• 扩展服务场景，新增音乐、阅读、汽车搜索及翻译等服务，意图识别更丰富，体验更便捷。
• 新增图片反光消除功能。体验路径：图库 > 查看图片 > AI 编辑 > 魔法修图 > AI 消除 > 反光消除。
• 新增图片褶皱去除功能。体验路径：图库 > 查看图片 > AI 编辑 > 魔法修图 > AI 消除 > 褶皱去除。
• 新增动态照片拼图功能。体验路径：图库 > 选中多张动态照片 > 创作 > 拼图。 • 新增动态照片编辑功能。体验路径：图库 > 查看动态照片 > AI 编辑。
• 新增照片表情修复功能。体验路径：图库 > 查看人像照片 > AI 编辑 > 魔法修图 > 人脸修复 > 表情修复。
• 优化图片水印编辑功能，可对部分水印元素进行添加或编辑。体验路径：图库 > 查看图片 > AI 编辑 > 水印。
• 新增 AI 扩图功能，支持旋转扩图和自由比例扩图，让照片秒变大片。体验路径：图库 > 选择照片 > AI 编辑 > 魔法修图 > AI 扩图。
• 新增 AI 风格功能，使能多样的创意风格，让照片重焕新生。体验路径：图库 > 选择照片 > AI 编辑 > 魔法修图 > AI 风格。
• 新增路人移除功能，体验路径：图库 > 选择图片 > AI 编辑 > 魔法修图 > AI 消除 > 路人移除。
• 新增 AI 换脸检测功能，视频通话时自动识别对方 AI 换脸风险，为您的安全保驾护航。体验路径：设置 > 安全 > 反诈防护 > 视频通话 AI 换脸提醒。
• 拓展在线主题栏的内容展示，支持无限下滑，海量主题资源任你选择 (主题应用需更新至最新版本支持)。体验路径：设置 > 桌面和个性化 > 主题 > 在线主题。
• 新增指定日期设置闹钟功能，可在时钟应用设定未来两年内指定日期的闹钟。体验路径：时钟 > 新建闹钟 > 点击日历图标设置。
• 新增录屏暂停功能。体验路径：启动录屏 > 录屏悬浮窗 > 点击录屏暂停按钮。 • 新增录屏隐藏通知消息弹框功能。体验路径：设置 > 辅助功能 > 屏幕录制 > 录屏隐藏通知。
• 新增截屏分享后删除原图功能。体验路径：截屏 > 分享 > 勾选分享后删除截图。
• 铃声选择界面 UX 焕新，提升用户使用体验。

• 新增“我的锁屏”栏，展示锁屏历史记录，支持设置或者删除。体验路径：设置 > 桌面和个性化 > 锁屏样式 > 自定义 > 锁屏样式 > 我的锁屏。 • 优化锁屏底部按钮交互，支持自定义设置。体验路径：设置 > 桌面和个性化 > 锁屏样式 > 自定义 > 点击左/右下角图标。 • 优化双击熄屏功能，双击锁屏空白处也可快速熄屏。体验路径：设置 > 辅助功能 > 快捷启动及手势 > 亮屏/熄屏 > 双击熄屏。 • 新增锁屏界面左下角手电筒快速开启入口，可向上拖动开启手电筒功能。 • 新增锁屏密码触感反馈功能，在锁屏数字密码输入界面输入时伴随振动效果，提升输入体验。
• 新增控制中心滑动音量条/亮度条到最大或最小时的振动效果。
• 优化蓝牙耳机电量显示，在蓝牙设置页面及控制中心展开蓝牙详情页面支持显示蓝牙耳机电量。体验路径：设置 > 蓝牙 > 已配对的设备。
• 新增支持与 iPhone 互传文件。在苹果 App Store 中下载“荣耀互联”应用即可体验高速免流量互传。
• 新增指南针振动反馈效果，当手机转动到正方向 (如：正南方向) 时，伴随振动效果，提升指南针使用体验。
• 新增支持 WLAN 密码输入可粘贴功能，提升输入效率。
• 新增应用剪贴板权限控制开关，可通过此开关管理应用读取剪贴板内容的权限。体验路径：设置 > 应用 > 应用管理 > 选择应用 > 权限 > 剪贴板。
• 新增隐藏应用功能，支持隐藏应用的桌面图标、桌面搜索入口、消息通知、最近任务等能力。体验路径：设置 > 隐私 > 隐藏应用。 • 新增按地区号码拦截来电功能。体验路径：系统管家 > 骚扰拦截 > 拦截规则 > 拦截国际地区陌生号码和拦截归属地陌生号码。 • 新增支持拦截虚拟运营商电话功能，为您提供更好的骚扰拦截体验。体验路径：系统管家 > 骚扰拦截 > 电话拦截规则。
• 新增桌面双击熄屏功能，双击桌面空白处可快速熄屏。体验路径：设置 > 辅助功能 > 快捷启动及手势 > 亮屏/熄屏 > 双击熄屏。 • 支持自定义首页桌面，可以自定义桌面任一屏作为首页，提高使用灵活性。 • 新增隐藏应用名称功能，开启后桌面图标、卡片和文件夹的名称会被隐藏，让界面更简洁。体验路径：双指捏合桌面 > 桌面设置 > 打开隐藏应用名称。
• 新增图片收藏显示设置。您可根据自身需求，设置图片同时显示在图库和收藏空间或仅显示在收藏空间。体验路径：收藏空间右上角三个点 > 设置 > 存储/显示设置 > 图片收藏。
• 新增平行空间无痕隐藏功能，开启后可隐藏平行空间使用痕迹，可以通过桌面双指外扩，快速进入平行空间。体验路径：设置 > 安全 > 平行空间 > 无痕隐藏。
• 新增 200+ 应用支持分身功能。体验路径：设置 > 应用 > 应用分身 > 更多分身应用。
• 优化灵动胶囊场景下的状态栏图标显示，在灵动胶囊出现时状态栏能显示更多图标。
• 优化控制中心蓝牙连接体验。展开控制中心已配对蓝牙设备列表，点击已连接的蓝牙设备即可断开。
• 新增悬浮窗风格选项，选择简洁风格可将悬浮窗顶部按钮隐藏至顶部小横条中。体验路径：设置 > 辅助功能 > 智慧多窗 > 悬浮窗风格。 • 新增分屏时可支持全局搜索组分屏对。 • 优化悬浮窗交互体验，支持同时操作悬浮窗和下层应用界面。 • 优化悬浮窗切换迷你窗交互体验。
• 新增图片编辑几何校正功能。体验路径：图库 > 选择照片 > AI 编辑 > 裁剪 > 旋转、水平、垂直。 • 优化图片文字编辑功能，支持调节排版样式，支持多次修改编辑。体验路径：图库 > 选择照片 > AI 编辑 > 文字。 • 提升拼图生成图片的清晰度。体验路径：图库 > 选择多张照片 > 创作 > 拼图 > 保存。
• 新增个人热点界面支持截屏，分享热点更便捷。 • 新增个人热点网络共享二维码，分享更便捷。体验路径：设置 > 移动网络 > 个人热点 > 开启个人热点 > 二维码连接。 • 新增个人热点自动关闭功能，可自由选择热点自动关闭时长。体验路径：设置 > 移动网络 > 个人热点 > 更多共享设置 > 热点自动关闭。

• 新增返回手势振动效果，增强返回手势振动体验。体验路径：设置 > 声音和振动 > 返回手势反馈。 • 优化系统触感反馈设置层级，将系统触感反馈开关由“设置 > 声音和振动 > 更多声音和振动设置”三级页面提拉到“声音和振动”二级页面下，方便用户快捷开关。 • 新增微信、QQ 三方应用通话录音功能。体验路径：设置 > 辅助功能 > 第三方应用通话录音。 • 新增音量快捷调节面板，支持媒体、来电、通知、闹钟和应用内音量单独调节。应用内音量单独调节开启路径：设置 > 声音和振动 > 更多声音和振动设置 > 应用音量单独调节。
• 优化蜂窝自愈方案，提升部分场景上网体验。
• 新增耗电优化功能，系统会根据您的用机情况，给出多维度的省电优化建议，可一键优化耗电，延长设备使用时间。体验路径：设置 > 电池 > 耗电优化。 • 新增系统深度优化功能，优化后可提升系统流畅度和电池续航。体验路径：设置 > 电池 > 更多电池设置 > 系统深度优化。
• 合入安卓 2025 年 6 月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2025/6
• 新增分屏时可支持全局搜索组分屏对。 • 优化悬浮窗交互体验，支持同时操作悬浮窗和下层应用界面。 • 优化悬浮窗切换迷你窗交互体验。
• 新增个人热点网络共享二维码，分享更便捷。体验路径：设置 > 移动网络 > 个人热点 > 开启个人热点 > 二维码连接。 • 新增个人热点自动关闭功能，可自由选择热点自动关闭时长。体验路径：设置 > 移动网络 > 个人热点 > 更多共享设置 > 热点自动关闭。
• 新增微信、QQ 三方应用通话录音功能。体验路径：设置 > 辅助功能 > 第三方应用通话录音。 • 新增音量快捷调节面板，支持媒体、来电、通知、闹钟和应用内音量单独调节。应用内音量单独调节开启路径：设置 > 声音和振动 > 更多声音和振动设置 > 应用音量单独调节。
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。

Dear user, this update enhances the Gallery with AI Cutout and Cleanup suggestions feature. Favorites Space has been upgraded to YOYO Memories. After using a knuckle gesture to circle the content and activate Magic Portal, you can now copy the text within the circled area. You can also swipe down on banner notifications from more apps to enter floating window mode. Update to enjoy the new features and improvements.

• AI Cutout enables you to extract the subject, move it to a new position in the image, and change the background • Cleanup suggestions feature enables automatic identification of duplicate photos, similar images, and oversized videos, providing more convenient cleaning suggestions

feature.title: Upgrades Favorites Space to YOYO Memories

features.feature: • You can quickly record information through various methods such as YOYO conversation, three-finger swipe down gesture, and syncing the content added to favorites within apps. YOYO conversation also allows you to quickly search for information at any time (Ensure that the text semantic model is updated to the latest version by going to: Settings > System & updates > Software update > Menu at the upper right corner > System resources)
• After using a knuckle gesture to circle the content and activate Magic Portal, you can copy the text within the circled area and paste it into the desired app via Magic Portal
• You can swipe down on banner notifications from more apps to enter floating window mode
• You can manually adjust the screenshot range while taking a scrolling screenshot
• You can now choose 30 minutes or 1 hour as the inactivity duration before the device enters Sleep mode
• Show steps on lock screen toggle allows you to disable the step count display on the lock screen
• Online ringtones are labeled with tags
• Keyboard elevation feature enables an elevation area that supports quick input switching and voice input
• You can select Never to prevent the personal hotspot from turning off automatically, keeping it always on
• The connected Bluetooth audio devices now show the Bluetooth audio codec

• Android security patch (Aug 2025) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about Honor Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2025/8

• Newly designed icons, cards, and Control Center bring you a refreshing aesthetic experience. • Refreshed color schemes and layout design for apps like Calendar and Notes make the system look better and easier to use. • Upgraded Weather & Clock card offers colorful and vivid options, delivering a vibrant visual perception.

• AI Outpainting can intelligently optimize the composition of lock screen wallpapers. Try it out by going to: Settings > Home screen & style > Lock screen style > Select photo > Pinch with two fingers to zoom in/out > Tap the AI Outpainting button that pops up in the bottom right corner. • AI Style provides a variety of creative lock screen wallpapers. Try it out by going to: Settings > Home screen & style > Lock screen style > AI Style.

• Fan-shaped zoom helps to improve the user experience. • Moving the function for adjusting video resolution to the top right corner enables a more user-friendly experience. • Relocating the switches for AI photography and other features simplifies the Camera's top toolbar, creating a more organized interface. • Remember settings allows the preservation of personalized photography settings, including Camera modes, Filters, Moving Photo, and Highlights Capture. Try it out by going to: Camera > Settings > Remember settings.

• Newly designed icons, cards, and Control Center bring you a refreshing aesthetic experience. • Refreshed color schemes and layout design for apps, such as Calendar and Notes, enhance the system's aesthetics and usability. • New Weather and Clock card offers colorful and vivid options, delivering a vibrant visual perception.

• AI Outpainting can intelligently optimize the composition of lock screen wallpapers. Try it out by going to: Settings > Home screen & style > Lock screen style > Select photo > Pinch with two fingers to zoom in/out > Tap AI Outpainting button that pops up in the bottom right corner. • AI style provides a variety of creative lock screen wallpapers. Try it out by going to: Settings > Home screen & style > Lock screen style > AI style.

• Fan-shaped zoom helps to improve the user experience. • Moving the function for adjusting video resolution to the top right corner enables a more user-friendly experience. • Relocating the switches for AI Photography and other features simplifies the Camera's top toolbar, creating a more organized interface. • Remember settings allows the preservation of personalized photography settings, including Camera modes, Filters, Moving Photo, and Highlights Capture. Try it out by going to: Camera > Settings > Remember settings.
• Long take animation enables smooth transitions across pages, like when you're in Notification Center, Control Center, looking at media cards, or receiving call/SMS notifications.

• The new interaction, powered by a multimodal large model, enables Q&A for images and documents. To instantly start Q&A, just wake up YOYO Assistant and send images or documents, or you can drag and drop items into Magic Portal.

• Intention recognition now covers more scenarios, such as music, reading, car search, and translation services, making operations more convenient. • Optimizes the image drag-and-drop feature in Magic Portal. Certain apps allow you to drag and drop a complete long image without any truncation.

• Magic Capsule now supports more scenarios, including short-term weather alerts, AI Deepfake Detection, and HONOR Share. This expansion allows for an improved global reach experience, ensuring that no important information is missed.
• Intention recognition now covers more scenarios, such as music, reading, car search, and translation services, making operations more convenient.
• AI Edit includes Remove reflection feature. Try it out by going to: Gallery > View an image > AI Edit > Magic Retouch > AI Eraser > Remove reflection.
• AI Edit also includes Remove wrinkles feature. Try it out by going to: Gallery > View an image > AI Edit > Magic Retouch > AI Eraser > Remove wrinkles.

• You can create moving photo collages. Try it out by going to: Gallery > Select multiple moving photos > Create > Collage. • You can also edit moving photos. Try it out by going to: Gallery > View a moving photo > AI Edit.
• Expression Fix is now available in Gallery. Try it out by going to: Gallery > View a portrait photo > AI Edit > Magic Retouch > Face Tune > Expression Fix.
• AI Edit allows you to add or edit specific watermark elements. Try it out by going to: Gallery > View an image > AI Edit > Watermark.

• AI Outpainting allows rotation or adjustment in a free ratio, instantly turning your photos into masterpieces. Try it out by going to: Gallery > Select an image > AI Edit > Magic Retouch > AI Outpainting.
• AI Style offers a variety of creative styles to give your images a new look. Try it out by going to: Gallery > Select an image > AI Edit > Magic Retouch > AI Style.
• Experience the new Erase passers-by feature by going to: Gallery > Select an image > AI Edit > Magic Retouch > AI Eraser > Erase passers-by.

• AI Outpainting allows for rotation or adjustment in a free ratio, instantly turning your photos into masterpieces. Try it out by going to: Gallery > Select an image > AI Edit > Magic Retouch > AI Outpainting.

• AI Deepfake Detection automatically detects AI face swaps during video calls to safeguard your privacy. Try it out by going to: Settings > Security > Scam Protection > AI face swap alert for video calls.

• Expands the content display of the Online themes, allowing you to explore a wide variety of themes through infinite scrolling. (Please ensure that the Themes app is updated to the latest version.) Try it out by going to: Settings > Home screen & style > Themes > Online themes.

• The Clock app allows you to set alarms for specific dates, enabling you to set alarms for selected dates within the next two years. To do this, go to Clock and create a new alarm, then tap the Calendar icon to choose your desired date.

• You can now pause screen recording. Start screen recording, then go to the floating window and tap the pause button. • You can also hide notification pop-ups during screen recording. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > Screen recording > Hide notifications while screen recording.
• The screenshot can be automatically deleted after it has been shared. Take a screenshot first, then tap Share, and check the Delete screenshot after sharing option.
• The design of Phone ringtone interface has been refreshed to enhance the user experience.

• My lockscreens column shows your lock screen history. You can set any of them as your current lock screen or delete them. Try it out by going to: Settings > Home screen & style > Lock screen style > Custom > Lock screen style > My lockscreens. • The widgets at the bottom of the lock screen allow for custom settings. Try it out by going to: Settings > Home screen & style > Lock screen style > Custom > Tap the icon in the lower left/right corner. • You can now quickly turn off the screen by double-tapping an empty space of the lock screen. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > Shortcuts & gestures > Screen On/Off > Double tap to turn off screen. • Quick access to Flashlight is available in the bottom left corner of the lock screen. You can drag it upwards to turn Flashlight on. • Lock screen password input includes haptic feedback. When you enter password on the lock screen, it vibrates to enhance the typing experience.
• You can feel haptic feedback when you adjust the volume or brightness slider in the Control Center to its maximum or minimum level.

• Optimizes the battery level display of Bluetooth earphones. To check the battery level, you can go to the Bluetooth settings page or go to the Control Center and expand the Bluetooth details. Try it out by going to: Settings > Bluetooth > PAIRED DEVICES.
• It supports file transfer with iPhone. Download Honor Connect from the Apple App Store to experience high-speed and data-free transfers.
• Compass’s vibration feedback enhances the user experience. When you turn the phone to face a cardinal direction, like due south, it vibrates.
• Entering Wi-Fi passwords through copy and paste can enhance input efficiency.
• You can determine which apps have access to the Clipboard content via Clipboard permission switch. Try it out by going to: Settings > Apps > Manage apps > Select an app > Permissions > Clipboard.

• Hidden apps feature allows you to hide selected apps. Home screen icons, notifications, and recent tasks of these apps will not be displayed. Additionally, these hidden apps will not appear in Home screen search. Try it out by going to: Settings > Privacy > Hidden apps. • Block rules now include the ability to block calls based on area codes. Try it out by going to: System Manager > Blocked > Block rules > Block unknown numbers from foreign countries/Block unknown numbers from home location. • Block calls from virtual carriers feature enhances your experience by more effectively blocking spam calls. Try it out by going to: System Manager > Block > Call block rules.

• You can now quickly turn off the screen by double-tapping an empty space of the Home screen. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > Shortcuts & gestures > Screen On/Off > Double tap to turn off screen. • You can now customize your Home screen by selecting any screen to serve as the home page, which enhances the flexibility in usage. • Enable Hide app name feature to hide the names of Home screen icons, cards and folders for a more streamlined interface. Try it out by going to: Pinch with two fingers on the Home screen > Settings > Enable Hide app name.

• Favorites Space now includes display settings for favorited images. You can select Show in both Gallery and Favorites Space or Show in Favorites Space only, based on your needs. Try it out by going to: Favorites Space > Three dots in the upper right corner > Settings > Storage/display settings > Favorited images.

• Discreet mode allows you to hide any traces of using Parallel Space. You can quickly enter Parallel Space by swiping outward with two fingers on the Home screen. Try it out by going to: Settings > Security > Parallel Space > Discreet mode.
• There are 200+ more apps supporting App Twin. Try it out by going to: Settings > Apps > App Twin > More twin apps.
• Improves the display of status bar icons in Magic Capsule mode, allowing more icons to be shown in the status bar when Magic Capsule is active.
• Enhances the user experience with Bluetooth connection in Control Center. To disconnect a device, expand the list of paired Bluetooth devices in Control Center and tap the device.

• The Concise style of floating window can hide the control buttons in the small control bar at the top. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > Multi-window > Floating window style. • When selecting apps for split-screen mode, you can use global search to find split-screen pairs. • Optimizes the floating window interaction experience. You can interact with the floating window and the app interface beneath it at the same time. • Enhances the interaction experience when switching floating windows to mini windows.

• Image editing now enables geometric correction. Try it out by going to: Gallery > Select an image > AI Edit > Crop > Rotate, Horizontal or Vertical. • Optimizes the text editing for images. You can adjust the layout style and make several edits. Try it out by going to: Gallery > Select an image > AI Edit > Text. • Improves the clarity of images generated by Collage feature. Try it out by going to: Gallery > Select multiple images > Create > Collage > Save.

• Personal hotspot interface now allows screenshots, making network sharing more convenient. • QR code for personal hotspot makes tethering more convenient. Try it out by going to: Settings > Mobile network > Personal hotspot > Turn it on > Scan to connect. • Set a duration of inactivity for personal hotspot, and it will automatically switch off if this period is exceeded. Try it out by going to: Settings > Mobile network > Personal hotspot > More > Duration.

• Back gesture haptics feature enables a better tactile experience. Try it out by going to: Settings > Sounds & vibration > Back gesture haptics. • The System haptics toggle is moved from the third-level menu (Settings > Sounds & vibration > More sound settings) to the second-level Sounds & vibration page. This change makes it easier for you to enable or disable the feature. • Call recording is available in third-party apps like WeChat and QQ. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > App call recording. • Quick volume control panel allows you to individually adjust the volume for media, incoming calls, notifications, alarms, and apps. Enable this feature by going to: Settings > Sounds & vibration > More settings > App volume control.
• The optimized cellular self-healing solution enhances the network performance in some scenarios.

• Battery optimization offers multi-dimensional power-saving suggestions based on your usage. It enables one-tap optimization to reduce power consumption and extend battery life. Try it out by going to: Settings > Battery > Battery optimization. • System optimization can enhance the system smoothness and battery life. Try it out by going to: Settings > Battery > More battery settings > System optimization.

• Android security patch (Jun 2025) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about Honor Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2025/6

• You can now quickly turn off the screen by double-tapping an empty space of the Home screen. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > Shortcuts & gestures > Screen On/Off > Double tap to turn off screen. • You can now customize your Home screen by selecting any screen to serve as the home page, which enhances the flexibility in usage. • Enable Hide app name feature to hide the names of Home screen icons, cards and folders for a more streamlined interface. Try it out by going to: Pinch with two fingers on the Home screen > Settings > Enable Hide app name.

• When selecting apps for split-screen mode, you can use global search to find split-screen pairs. • Optimizes the floating window interaction experience. You can interact with the floating window and the app interface beneath it at the same time. • Enhances the interaction experience when switching floating windows to mini windows.

• Image editing now enables geometric correction. Try it out by going to: Gallery > Select an image > AI Edit > Crop > Rotate, Horizontal or Vertical. • Optimizes the text editing for images. You can adjust the layout style and make several edits. Try it out by going to: Gallery > Select an image > AI Edit > Text. • Improves the clarity of images generated by the collage feature. Try it out by going to: Gallery > Select multiple images > Create > Collage > Save.

• QR code for personal hotspot makes network sharing more convenient. Try it out by going to: Settings > Mobile network > Personal hotspot > Turn it on > Scan to connect. • Set a duration of inactivity for personal hotspot, and it will automatically switch off if this period is exceeded. Try it out by going to: Settings > Mobile network > Personal hotspot > More > Duration.

• Call recording is available in third-party apps like WeChat and QQ. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > App call recording. • Quick volume control panel allows you to individually adjust the volume for media, incoming calls, notifications, alarms, and apps. To individually adjust the volume for apps, go to: Settings > Sounds & vibration > More settings > App volume control.

• Battery optimization offers multi-dimensional power-saving suggestions based on your usage. It enables one-tap optimization to reduce power consumption and extend battery life. Try it out by going to: Settings > Battery > Battery optimization. • System optimization can enhance the system smoothness and battery life. Try it out by going to: Settings > Battery > More battery settings > System optimization.

1. Installing this update will not affect your personal data, but it is still recommended to back up your data before updating. 2. Check out more information on product features in the Tips app. 3. If you encounter any problem during use, please get support by going to My Honor or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us.
